mapper.insert: insert into ecs_distribution (distribution_id, distribution_name, province_id, city_id, admin_id, distribution_phone, distribution_address, remark) values (#{distributionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{distributionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distributionPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distributionAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_distribution set distribution_name = #{distributionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distribution_phone = #{distributionPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distribution_address = #{distributionAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where distribution_id = #{distributionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select distribution_id, distribution_name, province_id, city_id, admin_id, distribution_phone, distribution_address, remark from ecs_distribution where distribution_id = #{distributionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select distribution_id, distribution_name, province_id, city_id, admin_id, distribution_phone, distribution_address, remark from ecs_distribution
